reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of VISA 210, VISA 287, FINA 287.
Prerequisites: VISA 210
Please note that online registration in 300 level VISA courses is restricted to our approved declared Majors. VISA Minors and students with the appropriate prerequisites can take this course, space permitting, if they submit a Change of Registration or Add/Drop form to the Department office in Lasserre, room 403.
If this course is blocked then it is full and a waiting list section has been opened. Please register yourself in the appropriate waiting list and please be aware that, while we hope all interested students gain entry to the course, registration in the waiting list does not guarantee a space in the course. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration.
description: Investigation of issues and topics in digital media and visual culture through the production of contemporary video art. Technical instruction in video manipulation software. Individual and/or group projects.
